text: Coconut burger, also known as sapal burger or niyog burger, is a Filipino veggie burger made with shredded coconut pulp (sapal), which are the by- products of traditional coconut milk extraction in Filipino cuisine. It is considered an ovo-vegetarian dish, but not vegan since it uses eggs as part of the ingredients. ==See also== *Piaparan *Bukayo *Laing (food) *List of meat substitutes ==References== ==Further reading== Category:Philippine cuisine Category:Vegetarian dishes of the Philippines Category:Meat substitutes Category:Vegetarian cuisine Category:Hamburgers (food)
title: Coconut burger
